mapper.sql: i_no, i_title, i_cdate, i_type, i_level, i_vesion, i_creator, i_changeperson, i_issuestate, i_plantime, i_finishtime
mapper.select:
select
,
from issue
1=1
and i_creator like concat('%',#{iCreator},'%')
or i_changeperson like concat('%',#{iCreator},'%')
having 1=1
and i_creator like concat('%',#{iCreator},'%')

select ,
from issue
1=1
and i_issuestate= #{iIssuestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and i_no like concat('%',#{iNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},'%')
and i_creator like concat('%',#{iCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and i_changeperson like concat('%',#{iChangeperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
